decisions.description: This decision tree is used to decide whether to display the matching exposures screen or not.
decisions.name: RU_Or_PFAS
decisions.label: RU Or PFAS?

Flow.description: 6/19 VP Made all questions required. 6/12 - AV - Added help text for adding a second address line when needed and changed the wording from the button "Next" to "Done". 6/9 - AV - Noticed some of the fields were missing form the assignment. while going through the PFAS questionnaire output. Added those fields so they get filled out. 6/3 - SC - Modified to support junction object 6/2- AV - Addded conditional logic to, "What protective gear did you use?" 5/30 - AV - Added conditional logic to "When and where was the Roundup purchased?" 5/30- AV - Removed deprecated exposure state mapping. 5/29 - Re-added questionnaire changes for RU that didn't save. 5/21 - Added back PWS ID and Name mapping to zip code path 5/16 - Added missing field "Residence_State_During_Exposure__c" to the create exposure records so that we can save that answer. 5/16 AV - Deleted PWS State from the resources since that's a deprecated field. 5/15 added component visibility for two questions. "If yes, was you blood tested for PFAS?" and "If yes, what were the water results?" 5/14 Added Additional Case Details, updated repeater field for residence state to map correctly. 5/12 Matching Exposure Record Table updated to show all records created, Updated Ongoing formula to include null end date 5/9 Adding Exposure Flow- Added question for residence state.

formulas.name: ExposureEndDate
formulas.expression: CASE( {!Get_Intake_Record.litify_pm__Case_Type__r.Name}, 'PFAS', 'End Date', 'Approximately, when did you stop spraying Roundup at this location?' )

formulas.name: ExposureStartDate
formulas.expression: CASE( {!Get_Intake_Record.litify_pm__Case_Type__r.Name}, 'PFAS', 'Start Date', 'Approximately, when did you start spraying Roundup at this location?' )

Flow.label: SRLG | Exposure Questions

fields.name: MatchingCounter
fields.fieldText: There are {!countExposures} matching exposures.

fields.name: ProofDisplay
fields.fieldText: Once the Questionnaire is complete, use the ‘Request Proof’ button to send the client the Dropbox link for uploading their water bill.

fields.name: ErrorMessage
fields.fieldText:
There was an error creating the exposure record.


{!$Flow.FaultMessage}

fields.name: ErrorMessageDelete
fields.fieldText: Hey there, you tried to delete something you weren't supposed to. How ironic.

fields.name: Please_provide_the_exposure_location_s_type_s
fields.fieldText: Please provide the exposure location(s) type(s)

fields.name: Exposure_Start_Date
fields.fieldText: {!ExposureStartDate}

fields.name: Has_your_exposure_to_Roundup_at_this_location_stopped
fields.fieldText: Has your exposure to Roundup at this location stopped?

fields.name: Exposure_End_Date
fields.fieldText: {!ExposureEndDate}

fields.name: AddressFormatGuide
fields.fieldText: IMPORTANT NOTE: If the address includes a second address line (e.g. apt #, suite #, etc.), please enter address as follows:

fields.name: What_state_did_you_reside_in_during_the_exposure
fields.fieldText: What state did you reside in during the exposure?

fields.name: Did_you_use_Roundup_at_home
fields.fieldText: Did you use Roundup at home?

fields.name: Did_you_use_Roundup_at_work
fields.fieldText: Did you use Roundup at work?

fields.name: How_was_it_applied_Hand_sprayer_backpack_tractor_with_hoses_etc
fields.fieldText: How was it applied? -- Hand sprayer, backpack, tractor with hoses, etc.

fields.name: What_was_the_size_of_the_Roundup_container_you_sprayed
fields.fieldText: What was the size of the Roundup container you sprayed?

fields.name: Where_did_you_apply_it_and_how_big_of_an_area_was_it_applied_Was_it_a_residentia
fields.fieldText: Where did you apply it and how big of an area was it applied? -- Was it a residential, commerical, farm, a fence line, yard, acres, etc.

fields.name: When_you_sprayed_the_product_did_you_use_protective_gear
fields.fieldText: When you sprayed the product, did you use protective gear?

fields.name: What_protective_gear_did_you_use
fields.fieldText: What protective gear did you use?

fields.name: Did_you_purchase_the_product_Roundup
fields.fieldText: Did you purchase the product, Roundup?

fields.name: When_and_where_was_the_Roundup_purchased
fields.fieldText: When and where was the Roundup purchased?

fields.name: What_would_be_your_best_estimate_of_total_amount_of_years_you_used_Roundup
fields.fieldText: What would be your best estimate of total amount of years you used Roundup?

fields.name: On_average_how_many_times_in_a_year_would_you_spray_Roundup
fields.fieldText: On average, how many times in a year would you spray Roundup?

fields.name: On_Average_how_many_hours_would_you_spend_spraying_Roundup_when_you_would_spray
fields.fieldText: On Average, how many hours would you spend spraying Roundup when you would spray?

fields.name: Were_you_the_property_owner_at_the_exposure_address
fields.fieldText: Were you the property owner at the exposure address?

fields.name: Do_you_have_a_water_bill
fields.fieldText: Do you have a water bill?

fields.name: What_type_of_water_source_did_the_property_use
fields.fieldText: What type of water source did the property use?

fields.name: Was_the_water_source_tested_for_PFAS
fields.fieldText: Was the water source tested for PFAS?

fields.name: If_yes_what_was_the_date_of_the_PFAS_water_testing
fields.fieldText: If yes, what was the date of the PFAS water testing?

fields.name: Do_you_have_any_other_information_about_the_exposure_location
fields.fieldText: Do you have any other information about the exposure location?
